attributes.action: remove himself and other labour party members from governemnt
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
for gross incompetence and for blatant stupidity
bringing in a tax that will encourage people to leave work and become benefit scroungers and put an estimated 5 million people in poverty

anyone stupid enough to think this tax could possibly help anyone really should not be running our country 

Scottish and former labour party supporter

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
